title: Fixed-Length Data Elements-General Information
description: Forty character positions (00-39) that provide coded information about the record as a whole and about special bibliographic aspects of the item being cataloged. These coded data elements are potentially useful for retrieval and data management purposes.

b.title: No dates given; B.C. date involved

k.title: Range of years of bulk of collection

p.title: Date of distribution/release/issue and production/recording session when different

15-17.title: Place of publication, production, or execution

n.title: Surveys of literature in a subject area

u.title: Unknown if item is government publication

n.title: Surveys of literature in a subject area
Surveys of literature in a subject area

u.title: Unknown if item is government publication

33.title: Original alphabet or script of title

.title: No alphabet or script given/No key title

dv.title: Divertimentos, serenades, cassations, divertissements, and notturni

.title: No parts in hand or not specified

f.title: Biography of performer or history of ensemble

g.title: Technical and/or historical information on instruments

.title: Not arrangement or transposition or not specified
Item is a music sound recording

g.title: Bound as part of another work

u.title: Unknown if item is government publication
Unknown if item is government publication

18-20.title: Running time for motion pictures and videorecordings

u.title: Unknown if item is government publication
